revised_title: Fine Structure of Hydrogen Spectral Lines: Measurements with a Reflexion Echelon
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to study the fine structure of hydrogen spectral lines using a reflexion echelon. They measured about 250 lines at the red end of the visible spectrum and analyzed their fine structures. This research provided a descriptive account of the observations and the analysis of the data obtained, with further analysis and interpretation to be published separately.
